attributes.review: This is THE SINGLE WORST APP EVER MADE. Every time I open it my phone screen cracks a little more. Not only that, but my phone glitches and plasters 🍊the Orange himself on my lock screen. I would just like to know who thought it would be a decent idea to take the face of a racist, white supremacist, disgusting bigot, narcissistic, unqualified clown and use it as a phone background. I’m am completely disgusted by the creators and supporters of this app

attributes.title: Babies? 27.
attributes.review: Right as i downloaded the app, Donald Trump personally face-timed me to thank me. Where he got my number, idk. Kinda creepy ngl. He showed me how he steals peoples babies in the middle of the night and where he keeps them. There are ab 27 babies just sitting in the oval office. Trump likes to do a two-way petting zoo with them- he pets the babies and they pet him back. It rlly weird and my dreams will now be haunted, all because i got this app. DONT DO IT.      SAVE YOURSELF.

attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: This app is the most worthless piece of crap I’ve ever encountered. It is terrible. No one should get it. It has no purpose. It’s named after a Cheeto in the White House. Just by that you can tell it’s terrible. But if you want an app that is praising a rapist go ahead. You’re part of the problem with America. attributes.title: I cannot believe this happened!! 🤬😡
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to show me favorite president some support 🥰 BUT you won’t BELIEVE what happened. I WAS HACKED. RIGHT AFTER OPENING THE APP. The app was just a white screen when I opened it, and suddenly my whole phone CRASHED??!!!! Then, I got an e-mail saying that my iCloud account has been signed in elsewhere!!!!!!!!!! WHAT IS GOING ON???!!!!!????????!!!!!!????? I cannot believe you would do this to me, Donald. How dare you 😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: TRUMPS A FACIST
attributes.review: By far the worst app I’ve ever used, made by the worst president I’ve ever seen. I went into my purchase with extremely low expectations, but WOW he truly out did himself! You would think that with all his time spent tweeting instead of addressing the current state of our country he could at least make a functioning app... Boy was I mistaken. If I could give this app less than a one star review I would☺️☺️❤️

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this app took forever to download!! it took longer than it normally takes to sacrifice my liberal cat in order to please our wonderful president 🥰✨🍊 (which is two days). as soon as the app finally downloaded the music it played summoned so many flys and made them lay their eggs on our sacrifice 😠😭. now we have to find a new cat and make it hate conservatives and all they love. like making choices for women’s bodies, not giving justice to those who died from under trained racist sexist cops, and the worst part 😖😖🤧 not believing in global warming 😪😪. this app has given me too much trouble and i now demand a refund from all the damage it’s done to my phone 😤😤

attributes.title: Scam
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to support the greatest president ever exist but once I did I got so much viruses in malware on my phone that my phone exploded into 1 million pieces this app is a scam and will cause security issues with your information on your phone now my nudes are on the Internet for the public to see my family and friends are able to see my nudes because of this app. Shame

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: The app completely crashed my phone!! Music was playing and my phone overheated! I thought it was going to explode! It took an hour to download and completely made it impossible to use anything else. Whoever made this app doesn’t know what he’s doing. It’s so horrible and can cause many issues. Again my phone almost exploded because of this app!!

attributes.title: Trashed App
attributes.review: This app is TRASH not only it made my phone glitch but it is also running my battery low and wasting my data this app should really go down the drain!!!!!!! No one should get this app just delete is already!!!
